record.description: Left to right: William V. Morgenstern, Class of 1920 (University Press Director); Dorothy Fay Barclay, Class of 1918; Frank L. Sulzberger, Class of 1907; Carl Beck, Class of 1904; David B. Stern, Class of 1902; Harold J. Gordon, Class of 1917; Howard W. Mort, Class of 1929; Herbert P. Zimmermann, Class of 1901; Arthur A. Baer, Class of 1918; John F. Dille, Class of 1909; and Vallee O. Appel, Class of 1911.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: See U of Magazine, vol. 35, 1942-1944, pp. 8-9.
